alert.note: Alert for Day; Marshall; Roberts (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 20 at 1:48PM MDT until April 22 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM CDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches, with locally higher amounts possible along the highest elevations. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...In Minnesota, Traverse County. In South Dakota, Marshall, Roberts and Day Counties. * WHEN...Until 7 AM CDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility, particularly on Friday during brief periods of heavier snow showers. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Visibility could be reduced down to a half mile or less at times in falling and blowing snow.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. In Minnesota, the latest road conditions can be obtained at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1. In South Dakota, the latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
